events.name: Meeting between Chinese and Australian Foreign Ministers
events.wd_label: Meeting between Chinese and Australian Foreign Ministers
events.wd_description: Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi urged Australian Foreign Minister Penny Wong to view China as a partner rather than an opponent, aiming to improve bilateral relations.
events.description: Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi urged Australian Foreign Minister Penny Wong to view China as a partner rather than an opponent, aiming to improve bilateral relations.

events.name: Wang Yi's statement
events.wd_description: Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi urged Australia to accumulate "positive energy" and improve ties by viewing China as a partner rather than an opponent.
events.description: Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi urged Australia to accumulate "positive energy" and improve ties by viewing China as a partner rather than an opponent.

events.name: Penny Wong's response
events.wd_description: Australian Foreign Minister Penny Wong acknowledged the meeting as a first step toward stabilizing relations but noted that trade blockages would take time to be removed.
events.description: Australian Foreign Minister Penny Wong acknowledged the meeting as a first step toward stabilizing relations but noted that trade blockages would take time to be removed.

events.name: meeting discussion
events.wd_description: During the meeting, Wang Yi emphasized that China was engaging in "equal exchange and cooperation" based on the needs of sovereign island nations.
events.description: During the meeting, Wang Yi emphasized that China was engaging in "equal exchange and cooperation" based on the needs of sovereign island nations.

events.name: President of Sri Lanka flees to the Maldives
events.wd_label: President of Sri Lanka flees to the Maldives
events.wd_description: Sri Lankan President Gotabaya Rajapaksa fled to the Maldives on a military jet hours before his resignation amid anti-government protests.
events.description: Sri Lankan President Gotabaya Rajapaksa fled to the Maldives on a military jet hours before his resignation amid anti-government protests.

events.name: Rajapaksa's departure
events.wd_description: President Gotabaya Rajapaksa fled to the Maldives on a military jet due to anti-government protests taking over his presidential palace and office.
events.description: President Gotabaya Rajapaksa fled to the Maldives on a military jet due to anti-government protests taking over his presidential palace and office.

events.name: state of emergency
events.wd_description: Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe declared a state of emergency after Rajapaksa's departure.
events.description: Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe declared a state of emergency after Rajapaksa's departure.

events.name: Prime Minister's role
events.wd_description: Ranil Wickremesinghe was appointed the acting President by Rajapaksa.
events.description: Ranil Wickremesinghe was appointed the acting President by Rajapaksa.

events.name: Sri Lanka air force statement
events.wd_description: The Sri Lankan air force confirmed Rajapaksa's departure, stating they provided a plane to fly him, his wife, and two security officials to the Maldives.
events.description: The Sri Lankan air force confirmed Rajapaksa's departure, stating they provided a plane to fly him, his wife, and two security officials to the Maldives.

events.name: Earthquake in Southern Iran
events.wd_description: A powerful earthquake and aftershocks struck the southern Iranian province of Hormozgan, resulting in fatalities and significant damage.
events.description: A powerful earthquake and aftershocks struck the southern Iranian province of Hormozgan, resulting in fatalities and significant damage.

events.name: Earthquake
events.wd_description: A magnitude-six earthquake struck near the coast, southwest of Bandar Abbas, causing at least five fatalities and significant damage.
events.description: A magnitude-six earthquake struck near the coast, southwest of Bandar Abbas, causing at least five fatalities and significant damage.

events.name: Aftershocks
events.wd_description: Two equally strong aftershocks were felt, extending the impact of the earthquake to neighboring regions including the UAE and other Gulf states.
events.description: Two equally strong aftershocks were felt, extending the impact of the earthquake to neighboring regions including the UAE and other Gulf states.

events.name: Ford's EV battery supply chain strategy
events.wd_label: Ford's EV battery supply chain strategy
events.wd_description: Ford is enhancing its battery supply chain by incorporating lower-cost, iron-based batteries from China and securing raw material supplies to boost electric vehicle production.
events.description: Ford is enhancing its battery supply chain by incorporating lower-cost, iron-based batteries from China and securing raw material supplies to boost electric vehicle production.

events.name: short-term goals
events.wd_description: Ford aims to produce 600,000 EVs annually by 2023, supported by its strategy to use cheaper and more abundant LFP batteries.
events.description: Ford aims to produce 600,000 EVs annually by 2023, supported by its strategy to use cheaper and more abundant LFP batteries.

events.name: increasing EV production
events.wd_description: Ford plans to increase its EV production from 27,140 units to 600,000 units annually by 2023.
events.description: Ford plans to increase its EV production from 27,140 units to 600,000 units annually by 2023.

events.name: importing LFP batteries
events.wd_description: Ford will import LFP battery packs from China’s CATL for its Mustang Mach-E and F-150 Lightning starting next year.
events.description: Ford will import LFP battery packs from China’s CATL for its Mustang Mach-E and F-150 Lightning starting next year.

events.name: long-term goals
events.wd_description: Ford aims to produce 2 million EVs annually by 2026, with plans to establish a 40-GWh LFP cell factory in North America and reduce reliance on nickel and cobalt-based batteries.
events.description: Ford aims to produce 2 million EVs annually by 2026, with plans to establish a 40-GWh LFP cell factory in North America and reduce reliance on nickel and cobalt-based batteries.

events.name: domestic LFP production
events.wd_description: Ford plans to open a 40-GWh LFP cell factory in North America by 2026.
events.description: Ford plans to open a 40-GWh LFP cell factory in North America by 2026.

events.name: reducing reliance on nickel and cobalt
events.wd_label: reducing reliance on nickel and cobalt
events.wd_description: Ford is shifting to iron-based LFP batteries to avoid supply issues related to nickel and cobalt.
events.description: Ford is shifting to iron-based LFP batteries to avoid supply issues related to nickel and cobalt.

events.name: supplier deals and partnerships
events.wd_description: Ford has announced several supplier deals and partnerships to secure raw materials and battery components directly from mining companies.
events.description: Ford has announced several supplier deals and partnerships to secure raw materials and battery components directly from mining companies.

events.name: direct sourcing from mining companies
events.wd_description: Ford has secured contracts to buy raw materials directly from mining companies to ensure a steady supply for battery production.
events.description: Ford has secured contracts to buy raw materials directly from mining companies to ensure a steady supply for battery production.

events.name: diversification of battery chemistry
events.wd_description: Ford is adding LFP battery chemistry alongside its existing NCM chemistry to diversify its battery options and reduce costs.
events.description: Ford is adding LFP battery chemistry alongside its existing NCM chemistry to diversify its battery options and reduce costs.
